backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and valentine snapshots with versioning, write‑token auth, and blob‑storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a spec file to components, tests, and feature metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light/dark romantic color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REMOTE_VIDEO_SAVE_SPEC.md: Markdown spec detailing the remote video save architecture, error handling, security, and test plan.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating pages, remote/local save-restore, authentication, polling, and video state.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders decorative floating heart icons with staggered animations.
frontend/src/components/SaveProgressButt: Save button with login handling, save modes, progress display, share links, and error UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and identity loading via an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentineSnapshotP: Polls the backend for newer Valentine snapshot versions and notifies when updates exist without overwriting local edits.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a pink/red themed light/dark palette with custom animations and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/saveId.ts: Utilities for reading, writing, and removing the saveId parameter in URLs and generating shareable links.
frontend/src/lib/valentineProgressStorag: Handles saving and loading Valentine progress using localStorage for text and IndexedDB for video blobs.
frontend/src/lib/valentineRemoteProgress: Implements backend interactions for Valentine snapshots including validation, encoding, conflict handling, and write token management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/FinalMessagePage.tsx: Renders the final message page with an editable textarea, animated hearts, and a styled preview of the final message.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with a customizable message input, decorative hearts, and a button to navigate to the next page.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Provides three video upload slots with editable headings, preview handling, and navigation to the next page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and features for the Valentine’s Day website.
